title: Digital Citizenship Week: Five Tips for Embedding Digital Citizenship in Schools
description: The internet has proven to be a critical tool in the classroom. Even with broad support among parents for the internet as a vital educational tool, we know the internet is a vast and varied place that can easily become a distraction or even a danger.
